description: HCT_ID: Primary key, auto-generated sequential ID. Format: auto-increment. Example: 12345
HCT_DOMAIN: Company domain this contact belongs to. Format: lowercase, no protocol. Example: acme.com
HCT_EMAIL: Verified email address from Hunter. Format: valid email format. Example: john.smith@acme.com
HCT_FIRST_NAME: Contact first name. Format: title case. Example: John
HCT_LAST_NAME: Contact last name. Format: title case. Example: Smith
HCT_DEPT_RAW: Department from Hunter. Format: Hunter department taxonomy. Example: Executive
HCT_TITLE_RAW: Job title from Hunter. Format: free text. Example: Chief Executive Officer
HCT_POSITION_RAW: Full position description from source. Format: free text. Example: CEO and Founder
HCT_LINKEDIN: LinkedIn profile URL. Format: https://linkedin.com/in/.... Example: https://linkedin.com/in/johnsmith
HCT_TWITTER: Twitter/X handle. Format: @handle format. Example: @johnsmith
HCT_PHONE: Phone number if available. Format: E.164 or formatted. Example: +1-412-555-1234
HCT_CONFIDENCE: Hunter email confidence score. Format: 0-100. Example: 95
HCT_EMAIL_TYPE: Whether email is personal or generic. Format: personal|generic. Example: personal
HCT_NUM_SOURCES: Number of sources confirming this email. Format: positive integer. Example: 5
HCT_CREATED_TS: Record creation timestamp. Format: ISO 8601. Example: 2026-02-03T12:00:00Z
HCT_EMBEDDING: Semantic embedding for similarity search. Format: OpenAI ada-002 format. Example: [0.1, 0.2, ...]
HCT_TITLE_NORM: Normalized job title. Format: standardized title. Example: CEO
HCT_SENIORITY: Seniority classification. Format: enum: C-Level/Owner|VP|Director|Manager|Senior|Junior|Individual Contributor. Example: C-Level/Owner
HCT_DEPT_NORM: Normalized department. Format: standardized taxonomy. Example: Executive
HCT_IS_DM: Whether contact is a decision maker. Format: true/false. Example: true
HCT_FULL_NAME: Combined full name. Format: First Last format. Example: John Smith
HCT_EMAIL_VERIFIED: Hunter verification status. Format: true/false. Example: true
HCT_QUALITY: Composite data completeness score. Format: 0.00 to 1.00. Example: 0.92
HCT_PRIORITY: Computed outreach priority. Format: 1-5 (5=highest). Example: 5
HCT_TAGS: Custom classification tags. Format: array of strings. Example: ["hot-lead", "construction"]
HCT_SOURCE: Data source system. Format: source identifier. Example: hunter
HCT_CT_ID: Link to company_target.company_unique_id. Format: UUID format. Example: a1b2c3d4-...
HCT_OUTREACH_ID: Link to outreach.outreach.outreach_id. Format: UUID format. Example: a1b2c3d4-...
